action.action-desc: Mr. Calvert introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Eastvale, California.

section.header: Single, unique ZIP Code for Eastvale, California
section.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this section, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code applicable to the area encompassing only Eastvale, California.
